name: Pixel Animals Ride
description:
Race with funny characters in new fast paced and challenging game, that will catch you for hours!

Don't worry, it's not too hard, but it will bring you match fun, just try. Tap to change the direction, collect coins and friends, unlock new characters and locations, how long can you run?

FEATURES:
- Different Characters and Locations
- Oldschool Gameplay
- Levels with increasing difficulty
